//base filter query utils
export var concatFilterQuery=function concatFilterQuery(options){var result=[];if(options.searchTerm){result.push("searchTerm=".concat(options.searchTerm));}if(options.page){result.push("page=".concat(options.page));}if(options.take){result.push("take=".concat(options.take));}if(options.between){result.push("between=".concat(options.between));}if(options.before){result.push("before=".concat(options.before));}if(options.between){result.push("between=".concat(options.between));}if(options.after){result.push("after=".concat(options.after));}if(options.fetchAll){result.push("fetchAll=".concat(options.fetchAll));}if(options.single){result.push("single=".concat(options.single));}if(options.relations){result.push("relations=".concat(options.relations));}if(options.selects){result.push("selects=".concat(options.selects));}return result.join("&");};var storagePrefix="jd_react_";export var storage={getToken:function getToken(){if(!window.localStorage||!window.JSON){return false;}var item=localStorage.getItem("".concat(storagePrefix,"token"));if(!item){return false;}return item;},setToken:function setToken(token){window.localStorage.setItem("".concat(storagePrefix,"token"),JSON.stringify(token));},clear:function clear(){localStorage.clear();},setData:function setData(data,key){if(!window.localStorage||!window.JSON||!key){return;}localStorage.setItem(key,JSON.stringify(data));},getDate:function getDate(key){if(!window.localStorage||!window.JSON||!key){return;}var item=localStorage.getItem(key);if(!item){return;}return JSON.parse(item);},removeData:function removeData(key){if(!window.localStorage||!window.JSON||!key){return;}localStorage.removeItem(key);}};export var methodSuccessMessage=function methodSuccessMessage(method){switch(method.toUpperCase()){case"POST":return"Created Success";case"PUT":return"Update Success";case"DELETE":return"Delete Success";default:return"";}};
